text: Ye niye uyilanga omuyaka okhuba eshimanyisio shie tsimbabaasi tsitsie okhula. Kata omuyeka oko shingala kuchinganga amaleesi amasiro khukayilanga khushialo shiafwa (eshiumu) mana khukekhoonyela khukhwishia amatsi, shinga endio nilwakhurusinjia buli imbia yebiamo. Mana khandi endio nilwakhulamusinjia abafu khomunyoole okhwitsulila
